text: Hassan Akesbi (5 December 1934 â€“ 9 November 2024) was a Moroccan footballer who played as a striker. He made four appearances for the Morocco national football team from 1960 to 1970. Akesbi died on 9 November 2024, at the age of 89. ==References== Category:1934 births Category:2024 deaths Category:Moroccan footballers
